data.name: AlreadyUpToDate
data.value: The local repository was already up to date with remote.

data.name: AuthenticationError
data.value: Error connecting to remote. Check your personal access token (PAT) and URL.

data.name: AuthenticationErrorInit
data.value: Error connecting to remote. Check your personal access token (PAT) and try again in a new folder, or remove the .git folder from your existing one.

data.name: BranchInsteadOfMain
data.value: Would you like to open a new branch instead of pushing directly to main?

data.name: BranchUponCommitPushPrompt
data.value: You're currently on the main branch. Would you like to push to a new development branch instead of directly to main?

data.name: BuildFolderDescription
data.value: About This Folder This folder is set up for saving your builds and is tracked by Git. You can use 'Save As' to save your projects as SPFX files directly into this folder under different names. They'll be stored with the rest of your repository remotely.

data.name: CatagoryNameVC
data.value: Version Control

data.name: CheckoutWithUncommitedChanges
data.value: An error occurred while trying to check out the branch due to merge conflicts. Make sure you have committed and pushed all changes before selecting a new branch.
data.comment: this is becasue it cant track what you did but is still in the disc so it will try to take these to the selected branch causing a merge conflict

data.name: Clonerepodetected
data.value: The destination folder you're trying to clone into isn't empty. Please delete all files in it or choose a new folder.

data.name: CloneSuccess
data.value: Success! Cloned Repository.

data.name: ConnectRepoBeforeActionError
data.value: You must first initialize a repository before using this action.

data.name: ConnectRepoPrompt
data.value: Would you like to connect to a repository?

data.name: FieldFillPAT
data.value: Please fill in all fields, including the personal access token (PAT).

data.name: FieldFillPath
data.value: Please fill in all fields, including the Path.

data.name: FieldFillURL
data.value: Please fill in all fields, including the URL.

data.name: GitOpenNoGitDetected
data.value: The folder you selected is not connected to any remote repository. Please select a new folder or a different repository action.

data.name: GitSafePullErrorDuringSafePush
data.value: There was an error in attempting a safe pull during the safe push, indicating there may be conflicts with the remote repository or credential errors, please resolve them before pushing changes.

data.name: GroupNameActions
data.value: Git Actions

data.name: InitAndOverride
data.value: Success! Initialized Repository and overrode Remote Repository.

data.name: Initrepodetected
data.value: A .git folder was detected in selected destination please delete this .git folder if present or choose a new folder.

data.name: InitWithDetectedFilesPopUp
data.value: Existing files were detected on this remote repository, would you like to override the data on the repo with local data, otherwise you may notice some instability with your local version.

data.name: InitWithDetectedFilesPopUp2
data.value: This is a removal action are you sure you want to delete all existing files on the remote repository. If just trying to connect to this remote repository you may want to clone into a empty folder on your device.

data.name: MainToMainMergeError
data.value: You are on the main Branch already.

data.name: MasterBranchRemovalFail
data.value: Failed to remove master branch after initializing feel free to ignore.

data.name: MergeConflicts
data.value: Merge conflicts were detected. Please resolve them before proceeding.

data.name: MergeToMainSuccess
data.value: Successfully merged current branch into main.

data.name: MustHaveRepoInstanceMerge
data.value: You must first initialize a repository before you can merge to main.

data.name: ButtonLabelPull
data.value: Pull

data.name: ButtonDescriptionPull
data.value: Get Latest Changes: Downloads and merges the newest updates from the shared project into your local copy. Be sure to close and reopen your project for changes to be present.

data.name: RemoteRetrival
data.value: Unable to communicate with provided URL.

data.name: RepoOpenedSuccess
data.value: Repository Opened.

data.name: TabName
data.value: GitFlow

data.name: ButtonLabelInit
data.value: Initialize Repository

data.name: ButtonLabelClone
data.value: Clone Repository

data.name: ButtonDescriptionInit
data.value: Turns a folder on your computer into a Git repository to start tracking file changes. Must be connected to a remote repository.

data.name: ButtonDescriptionClone
data.value: Downloads a complete copy of an existing remote repository, including all files and history, to your machine. It then syncs your new local repository to the remote cloned repository.

data.name: ButtonLabelOpenRepo
data.value: Connect Repository

data.name: ButtonDescriptionOpenRepo
data.value: Links your local repository to a remote one on a server, enabling you to sync changes.

data.name: ButtonLabelSelectBranch
data.value: Select Branch

data.name: ButtonDescriptionSelectBranch
data.value: Switches your current working context to a different line of development within the repository. Open and close project to see changes.

data.name: ButtonLabelMergeMain
data.value: Promote to Main

data.name: ButtonDescriptionMergeMain
data.value: Integrates the completed work from current branch into the primary main branch of the project.

data.name: ButtonLabelCommitPush
data.value: Commit/Push

data.name: ButtonDescriptionCommitPush
data.value: A commit saves a snapshot of your changes locally, and a push uploads those saved changes to a remote server. MUST save before this to ensure all changes are pushed.

data.name: PullForcePromptAfterFailSafePull
data.value: Conflicts were encountered when attempting to pull changes from the remote repository to your local project. Would you like to overwrite your local project with the remote version to resolve these conflicts?

data.name: PullForceSuccess
data.value: Pull successful. Please close and reopen your project to ensure all changes are fully reflected.

data.name: NormalPullSuccess
data.value: Local repository was synced to remote repository. Please close and reopen project for any changes to be reflected.

data.name: GroupNameRepoActions
data.value: Repository Actions

data.name: GroupNameBranchingActions
data.value: Branch Actions

data.name: ButtonLabelRemoveBranch
data.value: Remove Branch

data.name: ButtonDescriptionRemoveBranch
data.value: Branch Removal in Git works by removing the branch locally and then pushing that change to the remote repository to remove it there as well. This branch will still be present in other local repositories until deleted.

data.name: ButtonLabelGitReset
data.value: Local Reset

data.name: ButtonDescriptionGitReset
data.value: Resets your repository to the state it was in at time of your last commit/pushed or pulled changes. Please make sure to close and reopen your project to see changes.

data.name: DeleteNowOnMainMessage
data.value: You're now on the main branch. Please refresh your project to see the changes.

data.name: LocalResetSuccess
data.value: Your Repository has been reverted to your last commit. Please close and open you project to see changes.

data.name: CreateNewBranchWithSpaceError
data.value: There was an error creating this branch. Please make sure your branch name does not contain any spaces or special characters besides: ' - _

data.name: ErrorBadCharactersInRemote
data.value: There was an error pulling from the remote repository. There may be a branch name with special characters or formatted incorrectly in the remote repository.
data.comment: In one of the cases I will chack if there is an error message and display that after this if it shows the branch that is causing issues.

data.name: PushSuccess
data.value: Nothing to commit. Push successful.

data.name: ErrorNoPermissions
data.value: Please provide a new personal access token (PAT). There are currently zero permissions associated with this repository. Ensure you are in the correct repository, using the right PAT, and that it has not expired.

data.name: PermissionErrorBlockedAction
data.value: Permission denied: Unable to complete the requested action. This operation requires read and write access, but your current permissions are insufficient. Please try reconnecting to a different repository or using a different personal access token (PAT) with the necessary read and write capabilities.

data.name: AdditionalErrorInCleanup
data.value: Additionally there was an error likely due to your systems file permissions in the automated clean up process in response to this failure. Be sure to view the folder being modified to ensure there are no unwanted instances of .git, .gitignore, or Builds folders/files before trying again as this may cause future errors. Feel free to manually delete these if they are unwanted instances.

data.name: PermissionErrorReadAction
data.value: Permission denied: Unable to complete the requested action. Please check your personal access token (PAT) as it may have expired or lack the necessary read permissions. Generate a new PAT with appropriate scopes and try again.

data.name: BranchCouldntBeCheckedOut
data.value: Couldn't find that branch. It may have been deleted remotely.

data.name: RefreshFail
data.value: An error occurred while refreshing the project. Please Close and Reopen the Project.
